name: Fairy [A 3-day Otome Project]
description:
You are a coming-of-age fairy, who is looking for your heart's content. Your ancestral land, the Knowledge Garden, is dying due to your dad's health. Now it depends on YOU to find your power and sustain it.

The game contains:

• 12 possible endings 

• Original music by Nguyen

• 5,827 words by Kitty

• 6 original character art by Trixie

• 5 settings

• Self-reflective conclusions that are based on the study of eastern philosophy and humanistic psychology

[Watch How We Made the Game in 3 Days!]   

💌 A love message from the creators:

This game is made by three humans in three days! 

We challenged ourselves in order to start the year with creative passion and self-actualization.

The game also follows the theme of self-actualization and facing one's flaws. It sets in a peaceful town of fairies, who are a very decent and kind creature. Thus, the vibe is wholesome and uplifting, as well as self-reflective if you pay attention to the flow and details.

We hope this short game brings you more understanding and happiness. The conclusion in the game is very meaningful to us. It is a perspective that we truly celebrate and remind ourselves to live by on a daily basis.
